Detailed Description

Incremental device context updater used by class Image.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ImageIncrementalPdcUpdater::ImageIncrementalPdcUpdater (  const void *  client,
PaintDc &  pdc,
INT  max_delay = 500
) 
 

If OptionalConfig defines MaxDecoderDelay then this will be used instead of max_delay as maximal delay between two updates.
